alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 9:36AM CST until March 05 at 12:18PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saline River At Benton affecting Saline County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saline River At Benton. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor flooding begins at 18 feet, flooding of low lying pastures along the west bank. At 20.0 feet, Pastures along west bank will flood. There may be some low lying county roads near the river flooding. At 22.0 feet, Commercial and industrial facilities in the flood plain along the left bank may be affected. Water is deep in the pastures along the west bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 22.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date Saline River Benton 18.0 9.1 Thu 8 AM 20.9 14.2 9.4 22.0 6 PM 3/03 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
